//reg Reg_Dst, reg Reg_Write, reg Zero_Extend, reg ALU_Src, reg [2:0] ALU_Control
//xxxxxxxxxInstructionxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxPC_Plus4xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxResultxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx x x x x xxx
